name: Data Stream (F2022 Team 3)
description:
Project Datastream

Test #0415

Testing the Next Evolution of Viruses

Mission: Hijack Biological and Technological Components of a Cyborg Alien

  • Explore an Alien Body
  • Swim Through the Bloodstream and Catch Waves to Boost
  • Avoid Mechanical and Biological Defenses
  • The Host Will Test You With More Than Just Physical Obstacles

Controls:

Rotate player with Mouse

Latch/Unlatch with Right Mouse Button

Engage/Disengage Swimming Apparatus with Left Mouse Button

Note for Mac version:

Some Mac users have experienced permissions errors when trying to download and run Data Stream. If you are having this issue, go to the terminal and enter the command: 

chmod -R 755 [filepath]

Replace [filepath] with the actual file path on your computer (ex. /Applications/Data\ Stream\ Final.app). This can be done by typing it manually, or by typing "chmod -R 755 " and then dragging the application from your Finder into the terminal window.
